ActDepartment of Employment and Social Development Act
PrecisAppointment of DOMINIQUE FORGET of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Social Security Tribunal, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years and her designation as Vice-Chairperson of the Income Security Section, effective October 2, 2017.
